actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to enlarge the Sequoia National Forest in the State of California by adding to such national forest certain lands within the Sequoia National Park.

summary.text: Enlarges the boundaries of Sequoia National Park, California, by including the Upper Kaweah River Addition.

titles.title: A bill to enlarge the Sequoia National Forest in the State of California by adding to such national forest certain lands within the Sequoia National Park.
